h1: How Many Calories Are in a Guinness Pint?
assumptions: Standard Guinness Draught, 4.2% ABV, imperial pint (568 ml or 20 oz), poured from tap with typical head.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (draught vs. bottled), ABV, serving size, and brand; alcohol content affects totals. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard pint of Guinness has about 210 calories, mostly from carbs.

faqs.q: How many calories in a half pint of Guinness?
faqs.a: About 105 kcal for a 284 ml half pint of standard Guinness Draught.

faqs.q: Is Guinness low in carbs compared to other beers?
faqs.a: Yes, 10 g carbs per pint is relatively low; lighter lagers may have similar or less.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Guinness pint?
faqs.a: Around 4 g protein per pint from the barley malt.

faqs.q: Does the foam in a Guinness pint affect calories?
faqs.a: Minimal impact; foam is mostly air and has negligible calories.

faqs.q: Calories in bottled Guinness vs. draught?
faqs.a: Bottled is similar at ~210 kcal per 568 ml, but check specific labels for variations.
